Why Joint Stereo?
Proper stereo only uses very slightly more disk space, but there is no comparison in sound quality and stereo separation.....................

Thanks for the effort though
by joint stero u mean Mono???

Joint stereo is kind of a fake stereo that pans the mono in order to achieve the same effect as stereo for the human ear.

I really appreciate people that take time to rip music and present it like this so that we can benefit from it.

But when that is said, i do not understand why people still uses joint stereo when ripping. Not anymore, when the hard disk space is so cheap. I am unable to see any advantages with joint stereo. 
Please give me feedback on that if you see im missing something in this matter.
